00018 //---------------------------------------------------------
00019 //   MapVal
00020 //    value for ValMap
00021 //---------------------------------------------------------
00022 
00023 class MapVal {
00024       int _tick;
00025 
00026    public:
00027       MapVal()            { _tick = 0; }
00028       MapVal(int t)       { _tick = t; }
00029       virtual ~MapVal()   {}
00030       virtual MapVal* clone() = 0;
00031 
00032       int tick() const    { return _tick; }
00033       void setTick(int t) { _tick = t; }
00034       virtual int read(QDomNode) = 0;
00035       virtual void write(Xml&, int) const = 0;
00036       virtual bool operator==(const MapVal&) = 0;
00037       };
00038 
00039 //---------------------------------------------------------
00040 //  ValMap
00041 //    map of values
00042 //---------------------------------------------------------
00043 
00044 typedef std::map<int, MapVal*, std::less<int> > viMap;
00045 typedef viMap::iterator iValMap;
00046 typedef viMap::const_iterator ciValMap;
00047 
00048 class ValMap : public viMap {
00049       void normalize();
00050 
00051    public:
00052       ValMap() { clear(); }
00053       virtual ~ValMap() {}
00054       virtual MapVal* initVal() = 0;
00055 
00056       void clear();
00057       bool add(MapVal*);
00058       void del(int tick);
00059       MapVal* val(int tick) const;
00060       void read(QDomNode);
00061       void write(Xml&, const char* name) const;
00062       };
